ASTER AUTO

Australia's Trusted Import Agent for Japanese Cars

Find Out More

About Us

Aster Auto was established in 2024 and is a growing car importing agent dedicated to bringing high-quality Japanese cars to Australia. With staff based in Sydney, Melbourne, Canberra, and Japan, we manage the entire process required to bring a Japanese car to your door. Based on your needs, we source and purchase vehicles from all major Japanese auction houses, with our team in Japan conducting thorough inspections before making final bids. Aster Auto, we take care of the complexities of sourcing, importing, documentation, and compliance, so you can enjoy a hassle-free experience. Leave the complex work to us, and we'll deliver the car of your dreams right to your door!

Get Started!

Our Services

Sourcing & Importing


We bring your dream car from Japan to your door.

International

Car Shipping


We bring your car from Japan, Singapore, the United Kingdom, the United States, and New Zealand to Australia.

Compliance


We ensure your car meets Australian regulations and is ready for use on the road.

Japanese Car

History Check


Seen an imported car locally and concerned about its odometer or accident history? We can help you check its records in Japan.
